namespace std {
        template<>
        struct hash<MObject> {
                size_t operator()(const MObject& o) const {
                        return MObjectHandle(o).hashCode();
                }
        };
}

#define CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_CONTINUE(_status)                             \
{                                                                                                               \
        MStatus _maya_status = (_status);                                       \
        if ( MStatus::kSuccess != _maya_status )                        \
        {                                                                                                       \
                cerr << "\nAPI error detected in " << __FILE__  \
                         <<     " at line "     << __LINE__ << endl;            \
                _maya_status.perror ( "" );                                             \
                continue;                                                                               \
        }                                                                                                       \
}

#define CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(_status)                  \
{                                                                                                               \
        MStatus _maya_status = (_status);                                       \
        if ( MStatus::kSuccess != _maya_status )                        \
        {                                                                                                       \
                cerr << "\nAPI error detected in " << __FILE__  \
                         <<     " at line "     << __LINE__ << endl;            \
                _maya_status.perror ( "" );                                             \
                return;                                                                                 \
        }                                                                                                       \
}

        template <typename T> bool getPlugValue(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, T& value, unsigned int index = 0) {
                MStatus res;
                MPlug& plug = node.findPlug(attr.c_str(), &res);

                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        MPlug& childPlug = plug.child(index, &res);
                        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                                childPlug.getValue(value);
                                return true;
                        }

                        plug.getValue(value);
                        return true;
                }
                return false;
        }

        template <typename T> bool getPlugArrayValues(const MFnDependencyNode& node, std::wstring attr, std::vector<T>& values) {
                MStatus res;
                MPlug& plug = node.findPlug(attr.c_str(), &res);

                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        assert(plug.isArray() && "plug is not an array");

                        const unsigned int numElements = plug.numElements(&res);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, false);

                        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numElements; ++i) {
                                MPlug arrayElement = plug.elementByPhysicalIndex(i, &res);
                                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, false);
                                T value;
                                res = arrayElement.getValue(value);
                                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, false);
                                values.push_back(value);
                        }
                }
                return true;
        }

        template <typename T> bool setPlugValue(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, const T& value, unsigned int index = 0) {
                MStatus res;
                MPlug& plug = node.findPlug(attr.c_str(), &res);
                
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        MPlug& childPlug = plug.child(index, &res);
                        if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                                childPlug.setValue(value);
                                return true;
                        }

                        plug.setValue(value);
                        return true;
                }
                return false;
        }

        class ScopedProgressBar {
        public:
                ScopedProgressBar(bool visible, std::wstring title = L"") {
                        m_haveProgressBar = false;
                        if(visible) {
                                if(MProgressWindow::reserve()) {
                                        MProgressWindow::startProgress();
                                        setProgressStatus(L"");
                                        setTitle(title);
                                        m_haveProgressBar = true;
                                }
                        }
                }
                ~ScopedProgressBar() {
                        if(m_haveProgressBar) {
                                MProgressWindow::endProgress();
                        }
                }

                void setProgressMax(int val) {
                        MProgressWindow::setProgressMax(val);
                }

                void setProgress(int val) {
                        MProgressWindow::setProgress(val);
                }

                void setTitle(std::wstring title) {
                        MProgressWindow::setTitle(title.c_str());
                }

                void setProgressStatus(std::wstring status) {
                        MProgressWindow::setProgressStatus(status.c_str());
                }

        private:
                bool m_haveProgressBar;
        };

}
